text: Kevin B. Kamenetz (November 26, 1957 â€“ May 10, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Lochearn, Maryland. He was the 12th County Executive of Baltimore County, Maryland, serving between 2010 to May 10, 2018.Baltimore County Executive, Democratic candidate for governor Kevin Kamenetz dies , Baltimore Sun, May 10, 2018. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He served as a four-term County Councilman representing the Second District of Baltimore County."Baltimore County Md. County Council". Baltimore County, Maryland. January 5, 2016. Retrieved May 23, 2017. On September 18, 2017, Kamenetz declared his candidacy for the Democratic nomination for Governor of Maryland in the 2018 election.Wood, Pamela (September 18, 2017). "Baltimore County Executive Kevin Kamenetz joins Democratic race for governor ". The Baltimore Sun. Retrieved October 23, 2017. On May 10, 2018, Kamenetz died at a hospital of cardiopulmonary arrest in Towson, Maryland at the age of 60.Donovan, Doug; Wood, Pamela (May 11, 2018). "Baltimore County Executive, Democratic candidate for governor Kevin Kamenetz dies ". The Baltimore Sun. Retrieved May 11, 2018. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Lawyers from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kevin Kamenetz
